description:
Sailor Moon Super S turns the focus from http://anidb.net/ch7320 [Usagi] to little http://anidb.net/ch7463 [Chibiusa] and the pursuit of dreams as an enemy from the hidden past (the http://anidb.net/ch8471 [Dead Moon Circus]) returns during a total solar eclipse, bent on revenge against the joyful people of Earth and intent on spoiling everyone`s dreams by finding the one called http://anidb.net/ch7525 [Pegasus], who is hiding in Chibiusa`s dreams.
Source: absoluteanime.com/sailor_moon

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa follows a beautiful light into the forest. The owner of that light is Pegasus and he asks Chibi-Usa to keep their meeting a secret.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Meeting of Destiny: The Night Pegasus Dances
Unmei no Deai! Pegasus no Mau Yoru
運命の出会い! ペガサスの舞う夜

REGULAR.description:
In order to capture Pegasus as their first step in world conquest, the new enemy Zirconia orders her subordinates to seek out people with beautiful dreams.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Super Henshin Futatabi! Pegasus no Power
Super Transformation Once Again: Pegasus`s Power
スーパー変身再び! ペガサスの力

REGULAR.description:
Having a taste for older woman, Hawk`s Eye sets his sights on Usagi`s mother, Ikuko.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Mamore Haha no Yume! Double Moon no Shin Hissatsu Waza
Protect Mom`s Dream: Double Moon`s New Attack
守れ母の夢! Wムーンの新必殺技

REGULAR.description:
Tiger’s Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawk’s Eye.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Pegasus o Toraero! Amazon no Wana
ペガサスを捕えろ! アマゾンの罠

REGULAR.description:
Two of Mamoru’s friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Oniai no Futari! Usagi to Mamoru no Ai
The Perfect Couple: Usagi and Mamoru`s Love
お似合いの二人! うさぎと衛の愛

REGULAR.description:
Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight. And the reason is that Artemis was checking out a pretty nun at Juban Church?!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Artemis Is Cheating? Enter the Mysterious Kitten
Artemis no Uwaki? Nazo no Koneko Toujou
Beaucoup de bruit pour un chaton
アルテミスの浮気? 謎の子猫登場

REGULAR.description:
The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto`s classmate from her previous school.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Makoto no Yuujou! Tenba ni Akogareta Shoujo
Makoto`s Friendship: The Girl Who Admired Pegasus
まことの友情! 天馬に憧れた少女

REGULAR.description:
Tiger`s Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people`s shadow and control them from within.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Fureau Kokoro! Chibi Usa to Pegasus
触れ合う心! ちびうさとペガサス

REGULAR.description:
A small fire incident leaves Mamoru`s apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei`s place for the time being.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Mamoru o Mamore! Ninja Usagi no Yakimochi
衛を守れ! 忍者うさぎのヤキモチ

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ayakashi no Mori! Utsukushiki Yousei no Izanai
Forest of Illusion: A Beautiful Fairy`s Invitation
あやかしの森! 美しき妖精の誘い

REGULAR.description:
Ami is shocked when she sees Mamoru coming out of his apartment with another woman.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Drive to the Heavens: The Dream Car Fueled with Love
Tengoku made Hashire! Yume no Kuruma ni Kakeru Ai
天国まで走れ! 夢の車にかける愛

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Aim for No. 1 in Japan: The Troubles of a Pretty Swordswoman
Mezase Nippon Ichi! Bishoujo Kenshi no Nayami
目指せ日本一! 美少女剣士の悩み

REGULAR.description:
Famous designer Yoshiki Usui’s new store opens in the Juban District. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fish’s Eye, who is captivated by Usui`s good looks.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Mini ga Daisuki! Oshare na Senshi-tachi
We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians
ミニが大好き! おしゃれな戦士達

REGULAR.description:
Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. She quickly gathers her friends to spread the news, when they see Minako being dropped off by her boyfriend. Much to everyone`s surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Koi no Arashi! Minako no Futamata Daisakusen
Storm of Love: Minako`s Grand Two-Timing Plan
恋の嵐! 美奈子のフタマタ大作戦

REGULAR.description:
An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a huge mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, especially men, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Himitsu no Yakata! Ai no Menu o Anata ni
The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You
秘密の館! 愛のメニューを貴方に

REGULAR.description:
News reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not, much to Chibi-Usa`s frustration.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians` Super Transformation
Pegasus o Shinjiru Toki! 4 Senshi no Super Henshin
天馬を信じる時! 4戦士の超変身

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by checking out boys at the beach. Shingo is also with them acting as their bodyguard—especially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kirameku Natsu no Hi! Shiokaze no Shoujo Ami
Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze
きらめく夏の日! 潮風の少女亜美

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson for beginners and immediately sign up. As they clumsily practice, Fish’s Eye, who has also joined the lesson, draws the class`s attention with his elegant dancing skills.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Prima o Nerae! Usagi no Ballet
プリマをねらえ! うさぎのバレエ

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a strange woman named Rubina who follows them around at the fireworks festival. Unbeknownst to the two girls, Rubina is a princess visiting from the Kingdom of Amethyst who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Juuban Gai no Kyuujitsu! Mujaki na Oujo-sama
十番街の休日! 無邪気な王女様

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and the girls are excited as they dress up to attend the school festival being held at Mamoru`s university—particularly Makoto, who hopes to meet the man of her dreams.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Unmei no Partner? Makoto no Junjou
運命のパートナー? まことの純情

REGULAR.description:
Fish`s Eye goes after his next target, Mamoru. But despite his best efforts, Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi, causing Fish`s Eye to start questioning his own existence.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio`s Last Chance
巨悪の影! 追いつめられたトリオ

REGULAR.description:
Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they don’t capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon`s Last Stage
Yume no Kagami! Amazon Saigo no Stage
夢の鏡! アマゾン最後のステージ

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus, which suddenly appears in Juban District, and are entertained by all the amazing tricks they see.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Amazoness! Kagami no Ura kara Kita Akumu
The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors
アマゾネス! 鏡の裏から来た悪夢

REGULAR.description:
Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on making lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino. However, upon meeting him, Ami finds herself hesitant to show him the lyrics she made.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Shin no Power Bakuhatsu! Ami Kokoro no Shirabe
True Power Explodes: Ami`s Melody of the Heart
真のパワー爆発! 亜美 心のしらべ

REGULAR.description:
Rei becomes famous after posing for a fashion magazine cover in her shrine maiden outfit. She then receives a visit from a girl named Nanako, who expresses her desire to study under Rei so that she can become a beautiful shrine maiden just like her.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Flames of Passion: Mars`s Raging Super Attack
Honoo no Jounetsu! Mars Ikari no Chou Hissatsu Waza
炎の情熱! マーズ怒りの超必殺技

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. Unbeknownst to the girls, the dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kyoufu no Haisha-san? Palla Palla no Yakata
恐怖の歯医者さん? パラパラの館

REGULAR.description:
Minako and Makoto compete to win the heart of Honjo, a young principal who runs Honjo Preschool. But their rivalry starts to put a strain on their friendship.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Clash of Dreams: Minako and Makoto`s Broken Friendship
Yume Taiketsu! Minako to Makoto Zekkou Sengen
夢対決! 美奈子とまこと絶交宣言

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa’s school is having a sports day. However, one of its main events is jumping over the vaulting box, which Chibi-Usa is not very good at.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kyoufu o Koete! Jiyuu e no Jump
Overcome Your Fear: The Jump to Freedom
恐怖を越えて! 自由へのジャンプ

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa and Usagi befriend a struggling young painter named Kamoi at the park. Later, Kamoi is visited by Cere-Cere, who asks the young man to paint a portrait of her.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Don`t Lose Sight of Your Dreams: The Mirror of Truth
Yume o Miushinawanaide! Shinjitsu o Utsusu Kagami
夢を見失わないで! 真実を映す鏡
Pegasus ga Kieta!? Yure Ugoku Yuujou
ペガサスが消えた!? ゆれ動く友情

REGULAR.description:
Palla-Palla’s spell turns Sailor Chibi Moon into an adult and Sailor Moon into a child. At first Chibi-Usa is happy at her unexpected transformation, but her joy quickly turns into shock when she discovers that Pegasus can no longer hear her call for help
Source: hulu

titles.title: Pegasus no Himitsu! Yume Sekai o Mamoru Bishounen
Pegasus`s Secret: The Boy Who Protects the Dream World
天馬の秘密! 夢世界を守る美少年
Chibi Usa no Chiisana Koi no Rhapsody
ちびうさの小さな恋のラプソディ

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and her friends are doing volunteer work at Juban Civic Hall to help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. There, they befriend four young girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet in disguise.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Dream to Be an Adult: The Amazoness` Confusion
Otona ni Naru Yume! Amazoness no Touwaku
大人になる夢! アマゾネスの当惑

REGULAR.description:
Strange spider webs begin to appear all across the Juban District. As the girls investigate, they notice that these webs are all originating from the Dead Moon Circus.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Terror in Motion: The Dark Queen`s Evil Hand
Ugokidashita Kyoufu! Yami no Joou no Mashu
動き出した恐怖! 闇の女王の魔手

REGULAR.description:
Nehelenia sets her plan in motion by starting a solar eclipse that will leave the world in eternal darkness. Learning of her goals, the Sailor Guardians storm the Dead Moon Circus to prevent that from happening.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus
Yami no Shingenchi Dead Moon Circus
闇の震源地デッドムーンサーカス

REGULAR.description:
The Dead Moon finally discovers that Sailor Chibi Moon was the one hiding Pegasus, and captures her. Brought before Nehelenia, Sailor Chibi Moon learns the history behind the Dead Moon`s queen.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kagami no Meikyuu! Toraerareta Chibi Moon
Labyrinth of Mirrors: Chibi Moon Captured
鏡の迷宮! 捕えられたちびムーン

REGULAR.description:
Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon’s life. Meanwhile, the Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia, when they receive help from an unexpected ally.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Golden Crystal Shutsugen! Neherenia no Maryoku
The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehelenia`s Magic
黄金水晶出現! ネヘレニアの魔力

REGULAR.description:
Nehelenia regains her full power and proceeds to put the world into an eternal slumber. To stop her, Sailor Moon tries to activate the power of the Golden Crystal.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Crystal no Kagayaku Toki! Utsukushiki Yume no Chikara
When the Crystal Shines: The Beautiful Power of Dreams
クリスタル輝く時! 美しき夢の力

REGULAR.description:
The Golden Crystal’s power defeats Nehelenia, pushing her back into the abyss where she was originally sealed in. Refusing to go alone, Nehelenia tries to take Sailor Chibi Moon with her.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Dreams Forever: Fill the Heavens with Light
Yume yo Itsu made mo! Hikari, Ten ni Michite
夢よいつまでも! 光, 天に満ちて
An Elegant Metamorphosis? Crybaby Usagi`s Growth Diary / The Return of Haruka and Michiru! The Ghostly Puppet Show / Chibiusa`s Adventure! The Dreaded Vampire Castle
Karei ni Henshin? Nakimushi Usagi no Seichou Kiroku / Haruka, Michiru Futatabi! Bourei Ningyougeki / Chibiusa no Bouken! Kyoufu, Kyuuketsuki no Yakata
華麗に変身? 泣き虫うさぎの成長記録 / はるか みちる再び! 亡霊人形劇 / ちびうさの冒険! 恐怖, 吸血鬼の館
Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon SuperS Memorial
美少女戦士セーラームーンスーパーズ メモリアル

6006.name: Tokyo is the centre of the universe

titles.title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S
Czarodziejka z Księżyca: Sailor Moon Super S
Sailor Moon e il mistero dei sogni
เซเลอร์มูน SuperS
美少女戦士セーラームーンSuperS
Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon Super S
